title
Permanent Record
author
Edward Snowden
links
Goodreads
personal rating
9/10

Personal comments

I found the book a delight. It reminded me my own experience growing since we have so many similarities. I also dismantled things, I also lived up internet on the 90’s on bulletin boards and cracking groups.
